actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount a recipient may earn before deductions are made from benefits due to excess earnings.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,220 the amount of outside earnings which is permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits under such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount a recipient may earn before deductions are made from benefits due to excess earnings.
